query: query MovieTrailersWithOrder($movieId: Long!, $trailersLimit: Int = 10, $orderBy: TrailerOrderBy = MAKE_DATE_DESC) { movie(id: $movieId) { id title { ...MovieTitle __typename } trailers(limit: $trailersLimit, orderBy: $orderBy) { items { ...TrailerItem __typename } total __typename } __typename } } fragment MovieTitle on Title { russian original __typename } fragment TrailerItem on Trailer { id title preview { avatarsUrl fallbackUrl __typename } duration createdAt isEmbedded __typename }
